availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa Willson Power in Bath County, Kentucky, on April 11, 1838. Father of William Power, James Power, Richard Power, Catherine Power, Uriah Power, Elizabeth Power, Odd S. Power, Sarah Power, Woodson B. Power. Farmer in Bath County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 93.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bath County Marriages, Film #000273004, p. 393 (of microfilm), (Accessed via ancestry.com).
